name: Puzzle Muzzle
description:
It's a game, where you have to connect two square of the same color, but slightly darker.

It hase scores and game over features (when there is will be to many squares).

Every 2 seconds, two squares would spawn. The speed of spawning can rise!

This game is really short, because it was created with Construct 3 on ChromeOS, so I can switch to this engine and make better games with it.

Want to edit this game? Buy a source code!
